commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I sang my heart out! I feel amazing! School idols have such big performances!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I think I've given my cutest performance ever today! I heard my name being called out loud and clear!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I felt a different atmosphere today, too! The sense of unity felt great!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I left everything I had on stage, so now I'm completely drained of energy. Ah, oh no, I'm falling asleep... *Snore*

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Kanata! You can't sleep here!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Great job, everyone! That was an incredible live show!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Did you keep your eyes on us from the side?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Of course!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I could feel your passionate gaze on me.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I thought your gaze would burn a hole through me. Rina-chan Board says, "Eek!"

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* How was it for you, Setsuna? I could really feel your love today!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Yes, I believe those feelings reached my parents, too.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: That's because...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: ...I could see my parents cheering for me and getting in the groove from up on stage! They're normally so strict and serious, but they were smiling!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Of course they were! Your performance today was incredible, after all!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I have the secret live show I performed with you last night to thank for it!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm so happy for you, Setsuna!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Thank you very much!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Yeah, that's great! If they were dancing and cheering for you, that means they'll approve of your school idol activities!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I pray that this is true. I intend to formally tell them how I feel when I get home tonight.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: If, on the off chance, they disapprove, I'll help to persuade them.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I'll help, too!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Thank you very much! In any case, the live show felt really great! I feel like all of the gloominess inside me has been completely released!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: A text? Oh, it's from Mom!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: What?! Wh-What does it say?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Um... "Your live performance today was exceptional, Nana. I saw what you wanted to protect."

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: "I do not know how long it has been since I last saw you look so lively."

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: "What we thought was best for you ended up taking the smile away from your face."

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: "From here on, please follow what your heart wants. You have our full support."

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: "However, you can't let your grades drop by getting too obsessed with practice, okay? Thank you for inviting us to such a lovely live show today."

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Setsuna... This means they approve of your school idol activities, doesn't it?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: That's the only way I see it.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That's great, Setsuna! You got your message across to them! Congrats!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Th-Thank you very much! I really have you to thank for this. If it weren't for you, right now I'd be...

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Now, now! Everything worked out in the end, so no crying! Now you don't have to practice in secret anymore!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Right! I'll work harder than I ever have before as a school idol! I hope you will all continue to work with me, too!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yup, of course we will! Let's all give it our all!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Yeah!
